description: Discover the secret to making crispy zucchini fritters with this easy recipe. Perfect to whip up for breakfast, lunch or dinner, or as a snack.
name: Easy Zucchini Fritters Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium frying pan, heat oil for shallow-frying. Add spoonfuls of the mixture to the pan and cook for 3 minutes each side or until crispy and cooked through. Remove from pan and while repeating the process with the remaining mixture. Sprinkle over extra salt flakes to serve.
